Compliance description: Assess whether the code includes techniques to detect and mitigate model biases against specific groups.
Check if the code identifies patterns in incorrect predictions and provides insights for improvement.
Verify if the code includes strategies for handling failures, security threats, or biases.
Check if the code includes mechanisms to detect and flag unexpected predictions.
Verify if the code logs key metrics like accuracy, latency, and throughput in production.
Check if the code includes mechanisms to track shifts in input data distribution.
Ensure the code monitors changes in the relationship between input features and target labels.
Ensure the code maintains logs of predictions, failures, and user feedback for debugging.
